blocks.name: cae
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the 'almost everywhere' relation.

blocks.name: cfae
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the 'almost everywhere' builder.

blocks.name: df-ae
blocks.content: Define 'almost everywhere' with regard to a measure ` M ` . A property holds almost everywhere if the measure of the set where it does not hold has measure zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: relae
blocks.content: 'almost everywhere' is a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: brae
blocks.content: 'almost everywhere' relation for a measure and a measurable set ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm brae(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wbr(c1, cae, c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)), nat0)))
} = {
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wbr(c1, cae, c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)), nat0)))
  brabga(hs1, hs0, c1, cdm(c0), c0, cuni(crn(cmeas)), cae, wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0, cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  fveq12d(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1)), c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  difeq12d(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(c0)), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  unieqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dmeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-ae(hs1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w((c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ c1))= 0)
}

blocks.name: braew
blocks.content: 'almost everywhere' relation for a measure ` M ` and a property ` ph ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)

thm braew(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wb(wbr(crab(s0, c1, w0), cae, c0), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0)))
  -| wceq(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wbr(crab(s0, c1, w0), cae, c0), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wb(wbr(crab(s0, c1, w0), cae, c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w0), universe))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w0), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5eqelr(c1, universe, cuni(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(cuni(cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas)))
  uniexg(cdm(c0), universe)
  rabexg(s0, c1, universe, w0)
  brabga(hs1, hs0, crab(s0, c1, w0), universe, c0, cuni(crn(cmeas)), cae, wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0, cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  fveq12d(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1)), c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  difeq12d(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  unieqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dmeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-ae(hs1, hs0)
  eqeq1i(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0, cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))))
  fveq2i(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)))
  eqtri(cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdif(c1, crab(s0, c1, w0)))
  difeq1i(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0), c1)
  notrab(s0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, c1, w0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c1, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))), nat0))
}

thm braew(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures)‚Üí({ s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }[ae]c0 ‚Üî(c0 ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ w0 })= 0))
  ‚ä£ ‚ãÉ dom(c0)= c1
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures), { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }[ae]c0, (c0 ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ w0 })= 0, (c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))= 0)
  mpancom(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures), ({ s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }[ae]c0 ‚Üî(c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))= 0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures), { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eqelr(c1, universe, ‚ãÉ dom(c0), c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures))
  syl(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures), ‚ãÉ dom(c0)‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, ‚ãÉ ran(measures))
  uniexg(dom(c0), universe)
  rabexg(s0, c1, universe, w0)
  brabga(hs1, hs0, { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, universe, c0, ‚ãÉ ran(measures), cae, (c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))= 0, (hs0 `(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)\ hs1))= 0)
  eqeq1d((hs0 `(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)\ hs1)), nat0, (c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 })), (hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  fveq12d(hs0, (‚ãÉ dom(hs0)\ hs1), c0, (‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }), (hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  difeq12d(‚ãÉ dom(hs0), hs1, ‚ãÉ dom(c0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, (hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  unieqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), (hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(hs0, c0, (hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 } ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  simpr(hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, hs0 = c0)
  simpl(hs1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, hs0 = c0)
  df-ae(hs1, hs0)
  eqeq1i((c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 })), nat0, (c0 ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ w0 }))
  fveq2i(c0, (‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ w0 })
  eqtri((‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ w0 }, (c1 \ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))
  difeq1i(‚ãÉ dom(c0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }, c1)
  notrab(s0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w((c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))= 0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 `(‚ãÉ dom(c0)\ { s0 ‚àà c1 | w0 }))= 0)
}

blocks.name: truae
blocks.content: A truth holds almost everywhere. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm truae(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(crab(s0, c0, w1), cae, c1))
  -| wceq(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cmeas))))
  -| wi(w0, w1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(crab(s0, c0, w1), cae, c1), wceq(cfv(c1, crab(s0, c0, wn(w1))), nat0))
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, crab(s0, c0, wn(w1))), nat0, cfv(c1, emptycls), w0)
  fveq2d(c1, crab(s0, c0, wn(w1)), emptycls, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wn(w1)), emptycls), wss(crab(s0, c0, wn(w1)), emptycls))
  sylibr(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wn(w1)), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wi(wn(w1), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))))
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, w0, wi(wn(w1), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  pm2.24d(w0, w1, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  rabss(s0, c0, emptycls, wn(w1))
  ss0(crab(s0, c0, wn(w1)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cmeas))))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c1))))
  measbasedom(c1)
  measvnul(c1, cdm(c1))
  syl(w0, wb(wbr(crab(s0, c0, w1), cae, c1), wceq(cfv(c1, crab(s0, c0, wn(w1))), nat0)), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cmeas))))
  braew(s0, c1, c0, w1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm truae(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c0 | w1 }[ae]c1)
  ‚ä£ ‚ãÉ dom(c1)= c0
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | w1 }[ae]c1, (c1 ` { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 })= 0)
  eqtrd((c1 ` { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 }), nat0, (c1 ` ‚àÖ), w0)
  fveq2d(c1, { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 }, emptycls, w0)
  syl(w0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 } = ‚àÖ, { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 } ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  sylibr(w0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 } ‚äÜ ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(¬¨ w1 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ)))
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, w0, (¬¨ w1 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ))
  pm2.24d(w0, w1, s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ)
  rabss(s0, c0, emptycls, ¬¨ w1)
  ss0({ s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 })
  syl(w0, (c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures))
  sylbi(c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, c1 ‚àà(measures ` dom(c1)))
  measbasedom(c1)
  measvnul(c1, dom(c1))
  syl(w0, ({ s0 ‚àà c0 | w1 }[ae]c1 ‚Üî(c1 ` { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ w1 })= 0), c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures))
  braew(s0, c1, c0, w1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: aean
blocks.content: A conjunction holds almost everywhere if and only if both its terms do. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm aean(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)), cdm(c0))), wb(wbr(crab(s0, c1, wa(w0, w1)), cae, c0), wa(wbr(crab(s0, c1, w0), cae, c0), wbr(crab(s0, c1, w1), cae, c0))))
  -| wceq(cuni(cdm(c0)), c1)

  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)), cdm(c0))), wbr(crab(s0, c1, wa(w0, w1)), cae, c0), wa(wbr(crab(s0, c1, w0), cae, c0), wbr(crab(s0, c1, w1), cae, c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(wa(w0, w1)))), nat0), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w1))), nat0)))

  rabbii(s0, c1, wn(wa(w0, w1)), wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
  ianor(w0, w1)
  impbida(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cun(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)))), nat0), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w1))), nat0)))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cun(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)))), nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w1))), nat0))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cun(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), crab(s0, c1, wn(w1)))), nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), nat0), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wn(w0)), cdm(c0)), wbr(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wn(w0))), cle, nat0))

blocks.name: df-fae
blocks.content: Define a builder for an 'almost everywhere' relation between functions, from relations between function values. In this definition, the range of ` f ` and ` g ` is enforced in order to ensure the resulting relation is a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-fae(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cfae, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cuni(crn(cmeas)), copab(s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), co(cdm(cv(s0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s3), co(cdm(cv(s0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(s1)))))), wbr(crab(s4, cuni(cdm(cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cv(s0), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4)))), cae, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-fae(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ ~ae =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures)‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |((s2 ‚àà(dom(s0)[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(s1))‚àß s3 ‚àà(dom(s0)[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(s1)))‚àß { s4 ‚àà ‚ãÉ dom(s1)|(s2 ` s4)[s0](s3 ` s4)}[ae]s1)})
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: faeval
blocks.content: Value of the 'almost everywhere' relation for a given relation and measure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm faeval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, cuni(crn(cmeas)), cfae, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))))), wbr(crab(s2, cuni(cdm(c1)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cae, c1))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1)))))), wbr(crab(s2, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(hs0), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cae, cv(hs1)))))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1)))))), wbr(crab(s2, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(hs0), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cae, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))))), wbr(crab(s2, cuni(cdm(c1)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cae, c1)))

  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1)))), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(hs1)))), co(cdm(c0), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
